message: There's a Substandards due for this Thursday. Need suggestions for a bar, and a name. Go team:
Sick as a dog this week, hoping to be back at work Thursday but definitely not drinking until next week.
Smugglers Cove for D'AARRR Standards is my suggestion. They have an indoor waterfall.
I've never been to smuggler's cove and would love to go
Smuggler's cove is a bit special. I do like their "volcano" drink, good start to any evening. http://blogs.sfweekly.com/foodie/2011/03/volcano_a_flaming_delight_at_t.php
I've not been to Smuggler's, but that sounds fun :)
Just a thought, they might not do beer.. Lots of rum, definitely rum.
